name: TERA: Endless War
description:
The best strategy game with hexagon tile maps, and large-scale battles!

[Heroes of TERA at your command!]
Players can recruit legendary heroes from the world of TERA
to protect Arborea from the Argon invasion.
“You are the savior of Arborea. You must believe in the heroes and your instincts.”

[Supreme strategy in unpredictable battlefields!]
Formations to optimize various classes and abilities
Gain a strategic advantage by constructing camps and teleporting your troops
Cooperate with guild members through rallies and support to turn the tides of war at any moment.
“Your strategies will determine your fate.”

[Occupy cities and conquer the continent!]
There are large and small cities within a hexagon-tiled field.
Players can occupy cities through City Sieges on a regular basis
Now, Arborea awaits you.

[Explore numerous guild content, the more the merrier!]
You cannot protect the peace of Arborea alone.
Recruit guild members to fight at your side.
Guild members can support each other by providing aid on construction, resource transportation, and research.
You will fight together in City Sieges and more!

[Top notch graphics using Unreal4 Engine]
The world of legendary heroes, troops, monsters, fortresses, and 4x style hexagon tile maps
are all created with Unreal Engine to provide top quality SLG gameplay experience.
